CoreData¶

author

Leandro (Cerberus1746) Benedet Garcia

panda_core_data.DEFAULT_MODEL_GROUP = 'DEFAULT_MODEL_GROUP'¶

Default model group name, used for types and instances.

panda_core_data.DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_GROUP = 'DEFAULT_TEMPLATE_GROUP'¶

Default template group name, used for types and instances.

class panda_core_data.DataCore¶

Class where everything is kept.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

add_model_to_group(group_name: str, model, auto_create_group=True)¶

Add a panda_core_data.template.Model type to a group.

If auto_create_group is true and the group doesn’t exist it will be created. If false an exception will be raised.

Parameters

  • group_name (str) – Name of the group

  • model (Model) – panda_core_data.template.Model to be added

  • auto_create_group (bool) – If the group should be created if it doesn’t exist

Raises

DuplicatedDataTypeName – If there’s a model with the supplied name inside the group

add_template_to_group(group_name: str, model, auto_create_group: bool = True)¶

Add a panda_core_data.template.Template type to a group.

If auto_create_group is true and the group doesn’t exist it will be created. If false an exception will be raised.

Parameters

  • group_name (str) – Name of the group

  • model (Template) – Template to be added

  • auto_create_group (bool) – If the group should be created if it doesn’t exist

Raises

DuplicatedDataTypeName – If there’s a model with the supplied name inside the group

get_model_type(name: str, group_name: str = 'DEFAULT_MODEL_GROUP', default=None)¶

Get panda_core_data.template.Model type from the group

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the model type to get

  • group (str) – Name of the group

  • default (any) – Default value to be returned if model type is not found, if none, it will raise an exception, which is the default.

Returns

The panda_core_data.template.Model type.

Raises

DataTypeNotFound – If the model doesn’t exist.

get_template_type(name: str, group_name: str = 'DEFAULT_MODEL_GROUP', default=None)¶

Get panda_core_data.template.Template type from the group

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the panda_core_data.template.Template type to get

  • group (str) – Name of the group

  • default (any) – Default value to be returned if model type is not found, if none, it will raise an exception, which is the default.

Returns

The panda_core_data.template.Template type

Raises

DataTypeNotFound – If the model doesn’t exist.

class panda_core_data.Group(group_name: str)¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)
